com.github.zk1931.jzab.transport

Interface Transport.Receiver

  • Enclosing class:
    Transport

    public static interface Transport.Receiver
    Interface of receiver class. Transport will notify the receiver of arrived messages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDisconnected(String destination)
      Callback that notifies that the transport has been disconnected from the destination.
      void onReceived(String source, ZabMessage.Message message)
      Callback that will be called by Transport class once the message is arrived.

    • Method Detail

      • onReceived

        void onReceived(String source,
              ZabMessage.Message message)
        Callback that will be called by Transport class once the message is arrived. The message is guaranteed to be received in FIFO order, which means if message m1 is sent before m2 from sender s, then m1 is guaranteed to be received first.
        Parameters:
        source - the id of the server who sent the message
        message - the message

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected(String destination)
        Callback that notifies that the transport has been disconnected from the destination. Once this callback is invoked, the transport stops sending/ receiving messages to/from the destination. You need to call the clear() method to tell the transport it's ok to reconnect.
        Parameters:
        destination - the ID of the peer from which the transport got disconnected
